title: Social housing vacancies, lettings and arrears: April 2017 to March 2018
description: Information on the amount of housing units that were empty, housing units rented to tenants and social housing tenants who are in rent arrears.
notes: The stats are produced in PowerBi, the dimensions have not been collected as the information will be available in a different format. The dataset has been divided into 3 subsets:  Vacancies, Lettings and Arrears. There are 4 reports within vacancies, 2 reports within both  lettings and arrears.
